name: Dinner Tonight: Okra, Corn, and Tomatoes
description: Most of the okra I put down is pickled, which means A) I don’t have it that often and B) I haven’t the slightest idea what to do with it raw. I know about its powerful thickening properties and that...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound okra, stem removed and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter over medium heat and add the onions. Cook until translucent.
Add the okra and cook for 5 minutes. When done, add all the ingredients but the corn. Cover the pan and simmer until okra is nice and tender, about 5 to 10 minutes.
Toss in the corn with a minute or two to go, just to warm it.
